scenario.name: MESSAGE request without message body
scenario.send: MESSAGE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: sut <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 MESSAGE Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Message without body Content-Length: 0
